mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.version_name AS "versionName", a.version_code AS "versionCode", a.version_desc AS "versionDesc", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.product_id AS "productId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_version a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.version_name LIKE '%'||#{versionName}||'%' '%'+#{versionName}+'%' concat('%',#{versionName},'%')
AND a.version_desc LIKE '%'||#{versionDesc}||'%' '%'+#{versionDesc}+'%' concat('%',#{versionDesc},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_version( version_name, version_code, version_desc, begin_date, end_date, product_id, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{versionName}, #{versionCode}, #{versionDesc}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{productId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_version SET version_name = #{versionName}, version_code = #{versionCode}, version_desc = #{versionDesc}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, product_id = #{productId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
